Class User

java.lang.Object
User
Direct Known Subclasses:
MsgGroup
public class User extends Object
Responsible for basic User needs, such as Registration, Login and Logout and the main menu of the app.
Author:
Ilias Mpourdakos, Ioannis Papadakis, Ioanna Karitsioti

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the user
      pw - the password of the user
      email - the email of the user
      kword - a keyword for the user
      disc - the discoveribility preference of the user
